analysis.problem: Generated videos not accessible to Jellyfin due to permission restrictions
analysis.root_cause: Video files created with restrictive permissions (600) instead of readable (644)
analysis.jellyfin_user_access: Jellyfin service user lacks read access to patrick's Videos directory

immediate_fix: Add jellyfin user to patrick group
solution.prevention: Update video generation pipeline to set proper permissions automatically

training_data.lesson: Always set 644 permissions on generated media files for Jellyfin access
training_data.automation: Add chmod 644 to all video generation scripts
